name: Oh my blood!
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare 44: Your life is currency.

OVERVIEW:

Help Fred the Vampire to defend his shelter from strange monsters. 

Survive the different waves of enemies using spells and managing your mana correctly.

CONTROLS:
  • Move - Arrows or WASD
  • Jump - SPACE or UP arrow
  • Shoot - CTRL or LEFT CLICK
  • Change Spell - 1,2,3
  • Pause - ESC

Ludum Dare entry: LDJam 44
